layout.title: Digital Solutions for Thai Massage & Spa Businesses | VoucherStore
layout.description: Complete digital solutions for Thai massage and spa businesses. Websites, online booking, gift vouchers, AI receptionist, and reputation management - all in one place.

hero.title: Digital Solutions for Your Thai Massage & Spa Business
hero.text: We provide complete digital solutions for Thai massage and spa businesses across the UK and Europe. From websites to booking systems, we handle everything so you can focus on your clients.

logos.heading: Trusted by 100s of Thai Massage & Spa Businesses

services.title: Complete Digital Solutions for Your Business
services.text: From beautiful websites to automated booking systems, we provide everything your Thai massage or spa business needs to thrive online. All fully managed, so you can focus on what you do best.

items.title: Custom Websites
items.text: Lightning-fast, SEO-optimized websites that rank on Google and convert visitors into bookings. Mobile-optimized with unlimited edits.

items.title: Online Booking System
items.text: Let customers book appointments 24/7 from any device. Automatic reminders reduce no-shows by 80%. Completely integrated with your website.

items.title: Gift Voucher Management
items.text: Sell digital gift vouchers 24/7 with automatic delivery. Track redemptions and boost revenue with zero manual work required.

items.title: AI Receptionist
items.text: Never miss another call. Our AI answers every call instantly, books appointments, and sounds completely human. Works 24/7.

items.title: Reputation Management
items.text: Get more 5-star reviews automatically and respond professionally to all feedback. Build trust and attract more customers.

items.title: Local SEO
items.text: Rank #1 on Google Maps for 'Thai massage near me' searches. Dominate local search and get a constant stream of new customers.

services.bottomHeading: All This, Fully Managed For You
services.bottomText: We set everything up, train your team, and provide ongoing support. You focus on clients.

whoWeAre.header: We understand the unique challenges of running a Thai massage or spa business in the UK. That's why we've created an all-in-one digital solution specifically designed for businesses like yours - no technical knowledge required.
whoWeAre.title: Digital Solutions Built for Thai Massage Businesses
whoWeAre.text: We're not just another tech company - we're specialists in the Thai massage and spa industry. We understand your customers, your challenges, and what it takes to grow your business online. From websites to booking systems to reputation management, everything we build is designed specifically for businesses like yours.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business Online?

items.text: VoucherStore transformed our business completely. Our new website looks amazing, bookings have tripled, and the gift voucher system has become a major revenue stream. Everything is automated - we just focus on our clients now.
items.name: Nong Smith
items.title: Owner, Thai Serenity Spa, London

items.text: The AI receptionist is incredible - it answers every call perfectly in both English and Thai. We're ranking #1 on Google Maps now and getting 40+ bookings per week just from online. Best investment we ever made.
items.name: Som Johnson
items.title: Manager, Lotus Thai Massage, Manchester

pricing.title: It's Easy to Get Started
pricing.text: Choose the package that's right for your business. All plans include unlimited support, regular updates, and everything you need to grow your business online.
